name: On The Farm: Part III
overview: First was the sheep, then was Shep's turn. Now it's the Seagull's turn to take the action. You are a greedy seagull from St. Ives whose interested in Farmer Rich's crops. The only trouble is that those belong to the sheep. To be able to have crops, you have to stop the sheep invasion, simply by pooping on to those poor sheep. Now and then Shep will come along. You can poop on Shep to gain better ability, Madoone the mole for smart bombs. You must avoid contact with trigger happy Farmer Rich and the evil Edgar the Eagle. A pet eagle by Farmer Rich. Can your seagull poop on enough sheep to move on to the next level. Part of the RGCD C64 16KB Cartridge Game Development Competition 2012.
